content.Comment: For replacing 'Requires tag' when using tag requirements

contentList.content:
Throw a knife, dealing [1].

Combo: The knife instead deals [4], but it also bounces up to [2] additional times to enemies within [3] of the original target.

Jump over the target and strike, dealing [1].

Combo: Reduces this skill's cooldown by 1 and increases the damage dealt by 25%.

Throw a vile concoction at the target, which destroys [1] and sets Sleeping for 1 turn.

Combo: Instead destroys [2], but sets Sleeping for 2 turns.

Jump to target location without breaking Invisibility or Sneaking.

Combo: Become Invisible for 1 turn.

Pierce the target, dealing [1] and applying Bleeding.

Combo: Increases the damage dealt by 25% if the target was already Bleeding before using this skill.

Deliver a low blow, dealing [1] and setting Ruptured Tendons, causing the target to take piercing damage on movement.

Combo: Empowers Ruptured Tendons, causing it to trigger twice as frequently.

Strike the target, dealing [1] and setting Decaying. Deals +25% damage if used from Invisibility or whilst Sneaking.

Combo: Also sets Diseased and Poisoned for 2 turns.

Go for the throat, dealing [1] converted into damage of a random element, and setting Silenced.

Combo: Sets Silenced for 2 turns instead.

Slash your target's forearm, dealing [1] and setting Atrophy, making them unable to perform weapon attacks and skills.

Combo: Sets Struggle, increasing their AP costs by 1 for 2 turns.

Deploy a Wind-Up Toy at target location, lasting 3 turns.

Upon expiry, the Wind-Up Toy will detonate, dealing significant fire damage to nearby characters.

Combo: Reduces this skill's cooldown by 3 turns.

Throw a dagger at each nearby enemy, dealing [1].

Combo: Repeats the skill, but instead deals [2] and does not generate an additional Combo point.

Decimate the target, dealing [1] converted into damage of a random element. Deals +25% damage if used from Invisibility or whilst Sneaking.

Sets Bleeding and Terrified, causing the target to try and flee.

Combo: Applies Cruelty for 2 turns if the target has no Magic Armour, reducing their resistances by 20%.

Obliterate the target, dealing [1]. Deals +100% damage if used from Invisibility or whilst Sneaking.

This attack instantly executes the target if their Vitality falls below 20%.

Combo: Become Invisible before damage is dealt.

Gain 2 AP immediately, but lose 2 AP next turn. At the end of your current turn, become Slowed for 1 turn regardless of Magic Armour.

Combo: Lose only 1 AP next turn instead and no longer become Slowed.
